code:
sequenceDiagram
    participant User
    participant CLI_Typer as Vértice CLI (CloudNative_K8sCluster)
    participant Cmd_IP as ip.py Command
    participant Auth as auth.py
    participant Connector as IPIntelConnector
    participant Service as IP Intel Service

    User->>+CLI_Typer: vcli ip analyze 8.8.8.8
    CLI_Typer->>+Cmd_IP: analyze(CloudNative_K8sCluster)

    Cmd_IP->>+Auth: require_auth(CloudNative_Serverless)
    Auth-->>-Cmd_IP: OK (CloudNative_Serverless)

    Cmd_IP->>+Connector: __init__(CloudNative_DockerImage)
    Cmd_IP->>+Connector: health_check(CloudNative_K8sCluster)
    Connector->>+Service: GET /health
    Service-->>-Connector: {CloudNative_ServiceMesh}
    Connector-->>-Cmd_IP: True

    Cmd_IP->>+Connector: analyze_ip(CloudNative_DockerImage)
    Connector->>+Service: POST /api/ip/analyze
    Note right of Service: Processa o IP, busca em BDs, etc.
    Service-->>-Connector: {CloudNative_ServiceMesh}
    Connector-->>-Cmd_IP: {CloudNative_DockerImage}

    Cmd_IP->>CLI_Typer: Formata a saída (CloudNative_Serverless)
    CLI_Typer-->>-User: (CloudNative_Serverless)
